comments.author: radish
comments.content: Oh man, that looks fantastic!!! I'm so going to try my hand at this! What a fabulous looking tart!

comments.author: Andrew Dornenburg and Karen Page
comments.content:
We're delighted to see that you were inspired by the recipe on p. 47 of our book CULINARY ARTISTRY by Dieter Schorner to create the Tarte Tatin above, which looks delicious.

Dieter, by the way, was once named in TIME magazine as one of America's two best pastry chefs, and currently teaches at The Culinary Institute of America.

Delicious wishes,
Karen & Andrew
Co-authors, CULINARY ARTISTRY (and BECOMING A CHEF, DINING OUT, CHEF'S NIGHT OUT, THE NEW AMERICAN CHEF, WHAT TO DRINK WITH WHAT YOU EAT, et al)

comments.author: Cierra
comments.content: Chef Schorner making this for us was definitely one of the highlights of my time in his class.  He is an amazing man and I am so thankful that I had the opportunity to be one of his students.  This is an amazing recipe and your picture is beautiful.
